alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 5:17PM CDT until April 19 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Southern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 517 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Tuttle, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, southwestern Edmond, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Newcastle, Bethany, Mustang, Choctaw, Warr Acres, The Village, Tuttle, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Jones, Nicoma Park, Valley Brook, Tinker Air Force Base, Forest Park, and Woodlawn Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
